Package com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model

Class BlueDragon

java.lang.Object
com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Character
com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.BlueDragon
public class BlueDragon
extends Character
BlueDragon is a subclass of Characer, it inherites all the fields from the parent, also overides the attack() and defend() methods according to the rules of the game.
Since:
Mar 1, 2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
mikew

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int currentHealth
    Current health for the character as an integer value.
    private int maxHealth
    Max health for the character as an integer value.
    private int strength
    Strength of the character as an integer value.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    BlueDragon()
    The non-args constructor, set the value for the fields when being initialized maxHealth will be 1 to 400 (inclusive, D4*D100), current health should be exactly the same as the Max health when being initialized strength will be 4 to 32 (inclusive, 4*D8)
    BlueDragon​(int maxHealth, int currentHealth, int strength)
    This constructor calls the super constructor, allows specific values to be set.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Attack attack()
    attack() method is overrided by the class BlueDragon, it will return subclass of the class Attack, in this case, there are 80% chances to return MagicAttack's object, and 20% to return FrostAttack; both MagicAttack and FrostAttack will set the damage value as 4*D12;
    AttackReport defend​(Attack attack)
    This method is overided.

    Methods inherited from class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Character

    fullRecover, getCurrentHealth, getMaxHealth, getStrength, getTypeClassName, setCurrentHealth, setMaxHealth, setStrength, toString

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • BlueDragon

      public BlueDragon()
      The non-args constructor, set the value for the fields when being initialized maxHealth will be 1 to 400 (inclusive, D4*D100), current health should be exactly the same as the Max health when being initialized strength will be 4 to 32 (inclusive, 4*D8)
      See Also:
      DiceBag

    • BlueDragon

      public BlueDragon​(int maxHealth, int currentHealth, int strength)
      This constructor calls the super constructor, allows specific values to be set.
      Parameters:
      maxHealth - the maximum health of the character
      currentHealth - the current health of the character
      strength - the strength of the character

  • Method Details

    • attack

      public Attack attack()
      attack() method is overrided by the class BlueDragon, it will return subclass of the class Attack, in this case, there are 80% chances to return MagicAttack's object, and 20% to return FrostAttack; both MagicAttack and FrostAttack will set the damage value as 4*D12;
      Specified by:
      attack in class Character
      Returns:
      an Attack
      See Also:
      DiceBag

    • defend

      public AttackReport defend​(Attack attack)
      This method is overided. processes an Attack made against this character, to determine if the damage value was taken or if the damage was reduced or increased. in this case, if the attack is fire attack, then the damage value will be double; if it's a frost attack, there will be no damage caused; if magic attack, then normal harm;
      Specified by:
      defend in class Character
      Parameters:
      attack - the Attack against this character
      Returns:
      an AttackReport on how this character defended
